title: Searge: 或再度增强计分板功能
author: cyqsimon
txt_content:
本帖最后由 cyqsimon 于 2014-2-28 19:15 编辑 

Searge: So, what's coming next? How about some /scoreboard players set <player> <objective> <score> [dataTag] for the next snapshot? Sound good...
Searge: 嗯，接下来弄什么呢？下一次快照弄成这样如何啊 /scoreboard players set <player> <objective> <score> [dataTag] ?听起来不错...


Searge: That command is not allowing you to modify the NBT of the entity, it allows you to compare it as additional condition for setting a score.
Searge: 这个命令的功能不是允许你修改实体的NBT标签，而是允许你在设置分数时同时对目标条件进行额外限定。


简直震撼全场

[dataTag] （NBT标签）正式加入计分板！

用法是否和以前一样我们还不得而知，但是功能绝对流弊

下一次快照貌似很令人期待啊

replies.author: a919298641
